channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 也许你很难相信，曾经的爱尔兰酒吧如今已奄奄一息。沿着爱尔兰令人惊叹的狂野大西洋路（Wild Atlantic Way）进行的公路旅行，可以让我们一睹一些保留下来的酒吧。(更正错字）
item.description:
It may be hard to believe, but Irish pubs as they once were are a dying breed. This road trip along Ireland's stunning Wild Atlantic Way offers a glimpse of some holdouts. (corrects typo) https://t.co/YoHv0qmB5q https://t.co/YoHv0qmB5q

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 突发事件：美国联邦航空局（FAA）在最近几周接连发生安全问题后，正在加强对美国联合航空公司的审查
item.description:
Breaking: The FAA is stepping up scrutiny of United Airlines following a spate of safety issues in recent weeks https://t.co/sEiQZGNVAg https://t.co/sEiQZGNVAg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: "要么你结束这一切，要么我走人"在华盛顿特区的一个富人区，一桩少棒丑闻让位高权重的家长们相互对立，并导致了一项发现。
item.description:
“Either you end this crap, or I’m walking.” A Little League scandal in a tony part of Washington, D.C., pits high-powered parents against one another—and leads to a discovery. https://t.co/NKigKfI844 https://t.co/NKigKfI844

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）说他希望获得压倒性胜利，但贬低重要的选举工具并不会给他带来胜利。接受提前投票是他和所有共和党人取得胜利的关键，@JohnMTillman 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Donald Trump says he wants a landslide, but disparaging crucial electoral tools won’t give him one. Embracing early voting is key to the victory he and all Republicans seek, writes @JohnMTillman. https://t.co/TvThSwj7mN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 也许你很难相信，曾经的爱尔兰酒吧如今已奄奄一息。沿着爱尔兰令人惊叹的狂野大西洋路（Wild Atlantic Ways）的公路旅行，我们可以看到一些保留下来的酒吧。
item.description:
It may be hard to believe, but Irish pubs as they once were are a dying breed. This road trip along Ireland's stunning Wild Atlantic Ways offers a glimpse of some holdouts. https://t.co/ih0VcvHw0K https://t.co/ih0VcvHw0K

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：弗拉基米尔-普京自信满满。但如果经济下滑或俄罗斯军队失去动力，俄罗斯民众是否会反对他？
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Vladimir Putin is exuding confidence. But could the Russian populace turn against him if the economy declines or if Russian troops lose their momentum? asks @aknight613. https://t.co/RnCAB1L6r1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 没有一个国家愿意被称为 "香蕉共和国"，参议员查尔斯-舒默和以色列参议员本雅明-内塔尼亚胡之间的公开争论正是围绕这个词展开的。
item.description:
No country wants to be called a "banana republic," a term at the center of a public fight between Sen. Charles Schumer and Israel’s Benjamin Netanyahu https://t.co/PuXKKBe9bF https://t.co/PuXKKBe9bF

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：俄罗斯当局称，莫斯科郊外的一个音乐厅发生爆炸，枪手向音乐会观众开火，造成至少 40 人死亡。
item.description:
Update: At least 40 people were killed after explosions rocked a concert hall outside Moscow and gunmen opened fire on concert-goers, Russian authorities said https://t.co/48XubYrZ4d https://t.co/48XubYrZ4d

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 维多利亚-贝克汉姆（Victoria Beckham）知道你想谈论那**劳斯莱斯备忘录。以下是事情的经过，以及她日常生活中的 20 多个细节。
item.description:
Victoria Beckham knows you want to talk about *that* Rolls-Royce meme. Here's how it happened, plus 20-odd more details from her daily life. https://t.co/72fYivJ6Or https://t.co/72fYivJ6Or

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: "你可能和朋友拥有一盏相同的台灯，但一旦你更换了灯罩，它就会体现出你的个人风格"。室内设计师教你如何将廉价台灯改造成定制台灯。
item.description:
“You may own the same lamp as a friend, but once you change out the shade, it reflects your personal style.” Interior designers show you how to transform a cheap lamp into a bespoke one. https://t.co/jifkluKV1P https://t.co/jifkluKV1P

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 它看起来就像一个标准的纽约市停车场。但自 2024 年初以来，这座位于曼哈顿西村的建筑已经签订了超过 1 亿美元的交易。
item.description:
It looks like your standard New York City parking garage. But since the beginning of 2024, more than $100 million in deals have been inked at the building in Manhattan's West Village. https://t.co/XyGOh4Ug8V https://t.co/XyGOh4Ug8V

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 以丹尼尔-克雷格（Daniel Craig）为灵感的迷人俏皮男装指南。想象一下 007 休息日的样子。

A guide to charmingly playful menswear—inspired by Daniel Craig. Think 007 on his day off. https://t.co/lBXzB90opH https://t.co/lBXzB90opH

item.title: 玛乔丽-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）在麦克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）上任仅五个月后就提出了将其赶下议长职位的动议，但却没有采取强制表决的行动，这是众议院共和党人的最新戏剧性转折。
item.description:
Marjorie Taylor Greene filed a motion to oust Speaker Mike Johnson from his post just five months into his tenure but didn’t move to force a vote, the latest dramatic twist for House Republicans https://t.co/LHFgUJr3YL https://t.co/LHFgUJr3YL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 突发事件俄罗斯当局称，莫斯科地区的一个音乐会场发生爆炸，枪手向剧院观众开火。遇难者人数不详。
item.description:
Breaking: An explosion rocked a concert venue in the Moscow region and gunmen opened fire on theatergoers, Russian authorities said. The number of victims was unclear. https://t.co/KIqqXXbao0 https://t.co/KIqqXXbao0

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 观看：威尔士王妃凯特-米德尔顿表示，1 月份的腹部手术显示她患有癌症，目前她正在接受预防性化疗。
item.description:
Watch: Kate Middleton, the Princess of Wales, said abdominal surgery in January revealed that she had cancer and she is currently undergoing preventative chemotherapy https://t.co/bjYA6dIxUw https://t.co/bjYA6dIxUw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 印度主要反对党称，在税务机关冻结其账户并扣押其资金后，该党的竞选活动陷入困境
item.description:
India’s main opposition party says its campaign is in tatters after tax authorities froze its accounts and seized its funds https://t.co/uaQK212837 https://t.co/uaQK212837

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy）拥有 140 亿美元的比特币，其他的并不多。为什么这家公司价值 330 亿美元？
item.description:
MicroStrategy owns $14 billion of bitcoin—and not much else. Why is the company worth $33 billion? https://t.co/AJ9PLCcYDK https://t.co/AJ9PLCcYDK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息威尔士王妃凯特-米德尔顿（Kate Middleton）宣布她正在接受癌症治疗，癌症是在 1 月份的腹部手术后发现的
item.description:
Breaking: Kate Middleton, Princess of Wales, announced that she is undergoing treatment for cancer, which was discovered after abdominal surgery in January https://t.co/KUfIBjM4Hv https://t.co/KUfIBjM4Hv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: "可被他人发现"？苹果公司默认开启了一个听起来令人毛骨悚然的 iPhone 设置，导致许多人认为他们的信息在不知情或未经同意的情况下被共享了。以下是为什么它并不可怕--以及如何关闭它。
item.description:
“Discoverable by Others”? Apple turned a creepy-sounding iPhone setting on by default, leading many to think their information is being shared without their knowledge or consent. Here’s why it’s not so scary—and how to turn it off. https://t.co/z5s5n16QQt https://t.co/z5s5n16QQt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 克莱斯勒母公司 Stellantis 将在美国裁员数百人。

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：任何只关注以色列西南部加沙的人都忽略了一半。@ElliotKaufman6写道：北部的战争可能使加沙之战相形见绌，并永远改变黎巴嫩和以色列。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Anyone focused only on Gaza, to Israel’s southwest, is missing half the story. War in the north could dwarf the Gaza fight and change Lebanon and Israel forever, writes @ElliotKaufman6. https://t.co/H2wvpI9K78

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: Bee Wilson 写道：从胡萝卜蛋糕到 spanakopita，重塑经典菜肴有助于保持其生命力。
item.description:
From carrot cake to spanakopita, reinventing classic dishes helps keep them alive, writes Bee Wilson https://t.co/bJLkR4pwuZ https://t.co/bJLkR4pwuZ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 看：Neuralink 只是脑芯片新兴市场中的一个参与者，这些设备可以帮助人们通过心灵感应控制电脑等。华尔街日报》走进脑部手术室，了解植入物的工作原理。
item.description:
Watch: Neuralink is just one player in an emerging market for brain chips, devices that help people telepathically control computers and more. WSJ goes inside a brain surgery to see how the implants work. https://t.co/gGty6PnYux https://t.co/gGty6PnYux

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 人们深知失去亲人的悲痛。但是，人们对慢性疾病带来的悲痛却不甚了解。
item.description:
People are well aware of the grief that comes with losing a loved one. But less well understood is the grief that comes with chronic illness. https://t.co/I6JjqwKzjm https://t.co/I6JjqwKzjm

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：独立中央银行的论点是，我们普通公民需要明智的技术官僚来把我们从不良冲动中拯救出来。@josephsternberg 写道：事实证明，情况几乎恰恰相反。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The argument for independent central banking was that we regular citizens require wise technocrats to save us from our bad impulses. Reality is proving to be almost exactly the opposite, writes @josephsternberg. https://t.co/Jbidfud8DN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 突发事件：众议院立法者以微弱优势通过了1.2万亿美元的一揽子支出法案，克服了保守派后期提出的阻挠要求
item.description:
Breaking: House lawmakers narrowly approved a $1.2 trillion package of spending bills, overcoming a late charge by conservatives to block the effort https://t.co/PbQDMjt2bZ https://t.co/PbQDMjt2bZ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 即使在最著名的制造商破产之后，电动滑板行业的未来仍然看起来快速而有趣。感谢 Reddit。
item.description:
Even after the bankruptcy of its most prominent manufacturer, the electric skateboard industry's future looks fast and fun. Thanks Reddit. https://t.co/6Keb1i8o8c https://t.co/6Keb1i8o8c

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 据报道，世界各地的女性对自己的生活比男性更苦恼，也更满意。华尔街日报》的 @EmilyBobrow 提问：这是怎么回事？
item.description:
Women around the world report being both more distressed and more satisfied with their lives than men. WSJ's @EmilyBobrow asks, what’s going on? https://t.co/ObfIfsdbQW https://t.co/ObfIfsdbQW

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024
